name: Banana In Coconut Milk (Kluai Buat Chi Recipe)
description: This Thai banana in coconut milk recipe is easy to make and full of authentic flavors.

video.name: Whatâ€™s your favourite Thai dessert?? ðŸ¥° #thailand #thaifood #thaidessert #cookingthaifood #bananas

recipeInstructions.text: Place a pot filled with water over medium heat. Allow the water to boil and then add the unpeeled bananas to the boiling water, let them cook for 10 minutes. This method prevents them from becoming mushy.
recipeInstructions.name: Place a pot filled with water over medium heat. Allow the water to boil and then add the unpeeled bananas to the boiling water, let them cook for 10 minutes. This method prevents them from becoming mushy.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer to a sieve or colander, and let excess water drain. Let the bananas cool down to room temperature.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer to a sieve or colander, and let excess water drain. Let the bananas cool down to room temperature.

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and slice the bananas into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Peel and slice the bananas into bite-sized pieces.

recipeInstructions.text: Take the pandan leaves and tie them together in a knot.
recipeInstructions.name: Take the pandan leaves and tie them together in a knot.

recipeInstructions.text: Take a pot and set it over medium heat. Add coconut milk, palm sugar, salt, and the pandan leaves. Let the mix gently simmer and stir until the palm sugar dissolves.
recipeInstructions.name: Take a pot and set it over medium heat. Add coconut milk, palm sugar, salt, and the pandan leaves. Let the mix gently simmer and stir until the palm sugar dissolves.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the palm sugar has completely dissolved into the coconut milk mixture, carefully add the sliced bananas into the pot. Gently stir the bananas to coat them evenly with the sweetened coconut milk. Serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Once the palm sugar has completely dissolved into the coconut milk mixture, carefully add the sliced bananas into the pot. Gently stir the bananas to coat them evenly with the sweetened coconut milk. Serve immediately.

keywords: banana in coconut milk, kluai buat chi, thai grilled banana dessert
